headline: Vertex reports long-term results for Casgevy in sickle cell and thalassaemia
summary: Across 100 patients in three Phase III studies, Casgevy showed lasting benefits.

raw.headline: Vertex reports long-term results for Casgevy in sickle cell and thalassaemia
raw.summary: Across 100 patients in three Phase III studies, Casgevy showed lasting benefits.
